jobRole: I developed a React application based on the client's requirements and added an AI chatbot to it. I also integrated the chatbot with popular communication channels and used APIs to connect it with other bots. Furthermore, I integrated the bot with WhatsApp catalog to benefit the clients.
Proficient in evaluating information from diverse sources, reconciling conflicts, breaking down complex information into details, and adeptly understanding and resolving customer queries.

I was in charge of maintaining the website and identifying any bugs, as well as resolving them. Additionally, I conducted market research to enhance the user interface and created reports to analyze the data.
I was assigned a task that involved analyzing a dataset using Python and basic Machine Learning techniques to predict a student's marks and interpret the resulting reports.
